A hanging plant rack: Attach hooks to the rungs of the ladder and hang plants or other greenery, turning it into an interesting and eco-friendly plant display.
A clothesline hanger: Use the ladder as a clothesline hanger by attaching clothespins to the rungs and hanging garments on the ladder to dry in the sun.
A pet perch: Place a cushion on the ladder and use it as a comfortable resting spot for pets, especially cats, who enjoy high vantage points.
A window blind: Attach a window blind to the ladder and use it as a stylish, adjustable window covering that can be easily adjusted or removed.
A wall-mounted planter: Drill holes into the ladder and use it as a planter for small plants or herbs, adding an industrial touch to your garden or patio.
